caption: [Glyphs](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/glyphs/holbdohcbcodlejipgcmdleppjmfffhi) is a Chrome extension that provides quick access to common special characters through the floating window.

The homepage of W-ARTE! An artistic and educational platform founded by Roma Gąsiorowska.
caption: [W-ARTE!](http://w-arte.pl/) constitutes an artistic and educational platform devoted to art and business. It was founded on the initiative and under supervision of Roma Gąsiorowska in 2016.
